alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 3:46PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A HEAVY BAND OF SHOWERS MOVING SOUTHEAST TOWARD ABERDEEN AND AMERICAN FALLS THROUGH 515 PM MDT... At 342 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a heavy band of showers 13 miles northwest of Aberdeen, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 35 mph and moderate to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... American Falls Reservoir, Aberdeen and Sterling. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain
